alert.note: Alert for Rapides (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 20 at 4:50PM CST until November 20 at 5:45PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Rapides Parish in central Louisiana... * Until 545 PM CST. * At 450 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Alexandria International Airport, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Alexandria, Pineville, Boyce, Alexandria International Airport, Ball, Deville, Libuse, Tioga, Timber Trails, Esler Regional Airport, Kingsville, Holloway, and Paradise. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for central Louisiana.
